description:
Manual games allow you to set custom check locations and custom item names that will be rolled into a multiworld.
This allows any variety of game -- PC, console, board games, Microsoft Word memes... really anything -- to be part of a multiworld randomizer.
The key component to including these games is some level of manual restriction. Since the items are not actually withheld from the player,
the player must manually refrain from using these gathered items until the tracker shows that they have been acquired or sent.

PLA_1.04.description: Added 5 shiny locations toggled by yaml option, fixed Croagunk logic.
PLA_1.04.title: Pokémon Legends Arceus Manual 1.04

PLA_1.05.description: Fixed logic for Oshawott and Cyndaquil lines and Alakazam.
PLA_1.05.title: Pokémon Legends Arceus Manual 1.05

PLA_1.1.0.description:
- Updated to unstable release 20240528. 
- Updated to use hooks for yaml options. 
- Changed goal options: `wisps_total` and `wisps_required` to 1-108 range.
- Condensed fishing options to `fish_locations`, fixed too few locations bug. 
- `shiny_locations` updated to 0-10 range. 
- Deathlink added.
PLA_1.1.0.title: Pokémon Legends Arceus Manual 1.1.0

PLA_1.1.1.description: Added Coronet Highlands as category for Haunter
PLA_1.1.1.title: Pokémon Legends Arceus Manual 1.1.1
